TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CustomContentState extends System.Object

summary.span: enables the ability to navigate through different states of a single piece of source content without reloading the source content for each subsequent navigation.

span.span: enables the ability to navigate through different states of a single piece of source content without reloading the source content for each subsequent navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，不會儲存在巡覽記錄中的內容物件的執行個體。By default, does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反地，巡覽至使用巡覽記錄每次會建立內容物件的新執行個體。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行為被設計來巡覽大量內容時，避免過多的記憶體耗用量。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，內容的狀態並不會記住從一個瀏覽至下一步。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 不過，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]讓您能夠一段內容巡覽記錄項目相關聯的自訂狀態。However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] provides the ability to associate a piece of custom state with the navigation history entry for a piece of content. 瀏覽歷程記錄項目相關聯的自訂狀態必須是衍生自的類別。Custom state that is associated with a navigation history entry must be a class that derives from . 您將建立關聯與瀏覽歷程記錄項目使用下列技巧的其中一個物件：You associate a object with a navigation history entry by using one of the following techniques: - 呼叫**AddBackEntry**:Calling **AddBackEntry**: - - - .. - 設定其中一個下列事件引發時：Setting when one of the following events are raised: - - - - - 藉由實作想要與它相關聯的自訂狀態類別上。By implementing on the class that wants custom state to be associated with it. > [!NOTE] > 如果您呼叫**AddBackEntry**方法，您必須處理**瀏覽**事件或實作。If you call the **AddBackEntry** method, you must handle the **Navigating** event or implement . 瀏覽歷程記錄項目巡覽時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]檢查以查看自訂物件是與它相關聯。When the navigation history entry is navigated to, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] checks to see if a custom object is associated with it. 如果因此，它會呼叫以允許自訂物件，要套用它在先前的巡覽便已記住的狀態。If so, it calls to allow the custom object to apply the state it remembered from the previous navigation. 自訂類別可以覆寫若要變更所顯示的巡覽記錄項目名稱物件相關聯。A custom class can override to change the name that appears for the navigation history entry to which the object is associated. 值，傳回會顯示從瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的各種不同的導覽器 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]， ， )。The value that returns is visible from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the various navigators ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], , ). 衍生自類別必須是可序列化，這表示它必須至少會夾帶，並選擇性地實作。A class that derives from must be serializable, which means it must at least be augmented with , and optionally implement . > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您將資訊儲存在自訂內容的狀態時，您無法儲存任何頁面，您會記住其狀態如果的執行個體的參考不想要保留在記憶體中的內容。When you store information in custom content state, you cannot store any references to the instance of the page for which you are remembering state if don’t want the content to be retained in memory. 這可防止[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]從發行的網頁執行個體和失效的預設瀏覽歷程記錄行為的目的。This prevents [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] from releasing the page instance, and defeats the purpose of the default navigation history behavior. 如果您必須這麼做，請考慮使用改。If you must do this, consider using instead. ## Examples 以下是範例會覆寫的實作。The following is an example of a implementation that overrides . [!code-csharp[CustomContentStateSnippets#MyCustomContentStateCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomContentStateSnippets/CSharp/MyCustomContentState.cs#mycustomcontentstatecode)] [!code-vb[CustomContentStateSnippets#MyCustomContentStateCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomContentStateSnippets/visualbasic/mycustomcontentstate.vb#mycustomcontentstatecode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存後和向前巡覽記錄中的項目通常會提供從 [上一頁] 和 [向前] 下拉式清單導覽上的瀏覽按鈕[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的主應用程式導覽中，包括， ，或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]。Entries stored in back and forward navigation history are typically available from the back and forward drop down navigation buttons on the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the host navigator, including , , or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]. 是瀏覽歷程記錄下拉式清單中顯示的值。 is the value that is displayed in a navigation history drop down list. 沒有要覆寫;如果沒有，下列資料片段用來自動建構 瀏覽歷程記錄項目名稱，依照優先順序： does not have to be overridden; if not, the following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - .. - 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]目前頁面 and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]目前頁面。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page.

summary.span: Called to reapply state to a piece of content when navigation occurs.

span.span: Called to reapply state to a piece of content when navigation occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時，會呼叫項目都有相關聯的巡覽記錄中巡覽物件。 is called when an item in navigation history that has an associated object is navigated to. 當衍生自抽象類別，必須覆寫，雖然覆寫實作只需要呼叫基底方法。When deriving from the abstract class, must be overridden, although the override implementation need only call the base method.
